titleStmt.title: Wjt's progresse: wherein are launc't the various crimes, are incident to these sad times. Chapmen quickly come and buy me, if y' are wise, youle not deny me. Wit is cheapned, wit is sought, but wits neare good till it be bought. / The author Democritus Junior.
titleStmt.author: Democritus, Junior, fl. 1647.

notesStmt.note: This Democritus Junior is not Robert Burton, who also used the pseudonym.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
